Civic Tech Year in Review 💻⚖️⌛️

Apr 12, 2019

  • civictech
  • episode
  • retro

A little while back Civic Tech Chat hit it’s first year of existence. For this special episode, Veronica Young and Leah Bannon join us for a retrospective conversation looking at the past year in civic tech. We’ll find out things that went well, things that didn’t go so well, and what lessons they’ve learned around the way
